titles.title: To Thy throne room I boldly enter

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
To Thy throne room I boldly enter
For grace in time of need,
For this son I command You, Lord,
That You cause me to embrace the cross.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
You've borne me on eagles wings,
As a Father carried me,
Now I take hold of Thy grace, O Lord,
Thy power hid in the cross,
Now to Him Who is able to keep me:
Glory and honour and praise.
